item.title: Babelfish: Translate blog entries (trash!)
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_babelfish
BabelfishTranslate blog entries (trash!)

item.title: Static Page: : Shows an static page inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings
item.author: Marco Rinck, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_staticpage
Static Page: Shows an static page inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings

item.title: Picture of the author: Shows a picture of the author to each entry. The image file must be placed in the "img" Subfolder of your selected template and be called like the authorname. All special characters (quotes, spaces, ...) must be replaced by an "_" inside the filename.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_authorpic
Picture of the authorShows a picture of the author to each entry. The image file must be placed in the "img" Subfolder of your selected template and be called like the authorname. All special characters (quotes, spaces, ...) must be replaced by an "_" inside the filename.

item.title: Validates authors login: Validates the login credentials of an author using the sidebar login form
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_loginform
Validates authors loginValidates the login credentials of an author using the sidebar login form

item.title: Links to next/previous entry: Allows viewing the next/previous entry when viewing
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrypaging
Links to next/previous entryAllows viewing the next/previous entry when viewing

item.title: Gravatar: Show avatars inside comments
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_gravatar
GravatarShow avatars inside comments

item.title: head nugget: HOLDS_A_BLAHBLAH
item.author: Jannis Hermanns
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_head_nugget
head nuggetHOLDS_A_BLAHBLAH

item.title: Split long entries: Enables you to split longer entries into several subpages
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrysplit
Split long entriesEnables you to split longer entries into several subpages

item.title: Rules for publishing: Applies some checks before an entry is published
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrycheck
Rules for publishingApplies some checks before an entry is published

item.title: Tagging of entries: Allows freestyle tagging of entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_freetag
Tagging of entriesAllows freestyle tagging of entries

item.title: Multilingual entries: Allows to create multiple language versions of an entry
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_multilingual
Multilingual entriesAllows to create multiple language versions of an entry

item.title: LJ Update Plugin: Uses XMLRPC to post to your Livejournal
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_ljupdate
LJ Update PluginUses XMLRPC to post to your Livejournal

item.title: Trackback-Control: Allows granular control over how trackbacks are sent when creating entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_trackback
Trackback-ControlAllows granular control over how trackbacks are sent when creating entries

item.title: Show Emoticon toolbar: Shows a toolbar to select emoticons to insert into your entry
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_emoticonchooser
Show Emoticon toolbarShows a toolbar to select emoticons to insert into your entry

item.title: Amazon Media Button: Adds a button to allow Amazon.com search which are insertable into your entry
item.author: Matthew Groeninger
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_amazonchooser
Amazon Media ButtonAdds a button to allow Amazon.com search which are insertable into your entry

item.title: External user authentication (LDAP) [EXPERIMENTAL]: Allows to use external ressource to validate logins. Logins will be cached in the Serendipity database framework.
item.author: Garvin Hicking/Justin Alcorn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_externalauth
External user authentication (LDAP) [EXPERIMENTAL]Allows to use external ressource to validate logins. Logins will be cached in the Serendipity database framework.

item.title: Hide entries for non-registered users: Hides all entries which are older than a specified age, so that they are only visible for registered users/authors.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_outdate_entries
Hide entries for non-registered usersHides all entries which are older than a specified age, so that they are only visible for registered users/authors.

item.title: Delete Link: Adds a delete link to the footer of each entry.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_deletelink
Delete LinkAdds a delete link to the footer of each entry.

item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_markdown

item.author: Cameron MacFarland
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_photoblog
Photoblog EntriesAdds a single image to an entry.

item.title: Thumbnail Page: Shows a thumbnail page.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_thumbnails
Thumbnail PageShows a thumbnail page.

item.title: Gallery Display: Allows anonymous users to view gallery links
